pageContext.claim: “The [number of]  border [crossings] is down over 40 percent.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is talking about border apprehensions rose 42 percent in February, 206 percent in March and 244 percent in April. Setting that aside, many experts argue that this metric doesn't accurately define how many people are trying to enter the U.S., rather it is a measure of the success of the border patrol.
